name: Xray
keywords: Xray vmess vless trojan shadowsocks socks tor

AA.description: Beginner users only need to modify the following AUUID and click the Deploy app button at the end of the page to start the deployment
AA.value: If an error occurs, please check the parameter format or try a few more times. Before using custom parameters, be sure to fully understand their meaning

AUUID.description: UUID acts as the path and account password of each configuration. It is recommended to modify and save it properly. Websites that can generate UUID: https://www.uuidgenerator.net

CADDYIndexPage.description: After the custom CADDY deployment is completed, click the display page of View, refer toï¼šhttps://github.com/Trumpy/WinXrays/blob/master/etc/CADDYIndexPage.md

CONFIGCADDY.description: Read and configure the custom network address to run CADDY, please do not modify it if you are not familiar with CADDY configuration

CONFIGXRAY.description: Custom network address read configuration to run Xray, do not modify if you are not familiar with Xray configuration

ParameterSSENCYPT.description: SS encryption method, check the supported protocol: https://www.v2fly.org/config/protocols/shadowsocks.html

StoreFiles.description: Custom network address to read storage file list
